001
002package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node;
003
004import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.StaticContext;
005import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.format.IPathFormatter;
006import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IModule;
007
008import java.net.URI;
009
010import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
011
012/**
013 * Supports querying of global definitions and associated instances in a
014 * Metaschema module by effective name.
015 * <p>
016 * All definitions in the
017 * {@link gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IDefinition.ModuleScope#PUBLIC}
018 * are visible. This allows the exported structure of the Metaschema module to
019 * be queried.
020 */
021public interface IModuleNodeItem extends IDocumentBasedNodeItem, IFeatureNoDataValuedItem {
022
023  /**
024   * The Metaschema module this item is based on.
025   *
026   * @return the Metaschema module
027   */
028  @NonNull
029  IModule getModule();
030
031  @Override
032  default URI getDocumentUri() {
033    return getModule().getLocation();
034  }
035
036  @Override
037  default NodeItemType getNodeItemType() {
038    return NodeItemType.METASCHEMA;
039  }
040
041  @Override
042  default IModuleNodeItem getNodeItem() {
043    return this;
044  }
045
046  @Override
047  default String format(@NonNull IPathFormatter formatter) {
048    return formatter.formatMetaschema(this);
049  }
050
051  @Override
052  default <CONTEXT, RESULT> RESULT accept(@NonNull INodeItemVisitor<CONTEXT, RESULT> visitor, CONTEXT context) {
053    return visitor.visitMetaschema(this, context);
054  }
055
056  @Override
057  default StaticContext getStaticContext() {
058    return getModule().getModuleStaticContext();
059  }
060}
